justification: Rationale is A-centric and mislabels Michael Roberts as a TE1 despite Tier 4 context. It doesn’t address B’s consensus-driven, targets/touches focus or zero-RB philosophy. While B might part with a backup TE, Kyle Mitchell (volatile Tier 4 WR) and Brian Scott (low-target TE) don’t align with B’s preferences. Trade is superficially feasible but mismatched to B’s incentives and misreads player value, weakening consistency and explanation.
